titleStmt.title: A reply to the defence of Dr. Stillingfleet being a counter plot for union between the Protestants, in opposition to the project of others for conjunction with the Church of Rome / by the authors of the Modest and peaceable inquiry, of the Reflections, (i.e.) the Country confor., of the Peaceable designe.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.
Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Humfrey and Stephen Lobb. Cf. Wing.
Pref. signed on p. [22]: Stephen Lobb.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
